Usage Guide

Basic Usage

# Run with specific robot
python gamepad_control.py panda

# Interactive robot selection
python gamepad_control.py

Controls

Panda/UR5 Controls: - Right Stick Y: Forward/Backward - Left Stick X: Left/Right - Left Stick Y: Up/Down - A Button: Toggle Gripper - START: Exit

SO100 Controls: - Left Stick X: Rotation - Left/Right Stick Y: Translation - Shoulder Buttons: Wrist control
